msbt.message: Hey, it's ! Man, I haven't seen you in a while. Were you on vacation?Did you eat a bunch of yummy stuff while you were gone? Tell me ALL about it!

! Where have you been for the last <50_8 x="0" y="0" a="weeks" b="week" c="weeks" />?Everyone's been worried about where you were!I'm happy to see you again! You should go say hi to everybody, then we can hang out, !

! Where have you BEEN?Something amazing happened while you were gone! Guess what it was! I'll tell youI bet that I could eat my weight in and said I couldn't was right. I only got, like, 12 pounds in before I reverse-snacked all over the place.Anyway, welcome home!
Yaaay! You finally talked to me! I keep meaning to say "hi," but you always seem so busy!We gotta hang out and get deep into snacks sometime, !

I know you've been on this island somewhere, , but I couldn't find you!I even stood outside your house for a whole day! Except for when I had to go to the bathroomI didn't think you'd want me doing that in front of your house.My bug friends said I'd find you, and they were right! Let's hang out later, !

Huh? It's been a while since we've talked I think.I've been having a lot of weird dreams lately.Maybe my jar of finally went bad? Dunno why. I keep it in a warm, damp place ANYWAY!In my dreams, we talked every night. Sometimes you had two heads. So I'm betting that right now is real.
